overview: Avi’s fiance, Kenna may be the dream girl - but Avi she still has reservations over whether Kenna is actually “the one”. Those reservations are only escalated when Avi meets Kenna’s brother Michael, sparking feelings inside her she didn’t know she was capable of. Unsure why a man is giving her butterflies, Avi tries hard to fight the desire building inside of her. But one night, in a fit of passion, Michael and Avi share a kiss - one that quickly sends Avi spiraling into confusion. Is she willing to lose everything for this forbidden affair?
title: Forbidden Affairs 10: My Fiancee's Brother
